001    package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
002    
003    import com.opensymphony.oscache.base.NeedsRefreshException;
004    import org.greatage.util.DescriptionBuilder;
005    
006    /**
007     * This class represents cache implementation for OSCache cache API.
008     *
009     * @param <K> type of cache keys
010     * @param <V> type of cache items
011     * @author Ivan Khalopik
012     * @since 1.0
013     */
014    public class OSCache<K, V> implements Cache<K, V> {
015            private static final int DEFAULT_REFRESH_PERIOD = 10000;
016    
017            private final com.opensymphony.oscache.base.Cache cache;
018            private final String name;
019            private final int refreshPeriod;
020            private final String[] group;
021    
022            /**
023             * Creates new instance of cache implementation for OSCache cache API.
024             *
025             * @param cache OS cache instance
026             * @param name  cache name
027             */
028            public OSCache(final com.opensymphony.oscache.base.Cache cache, final String name) {
029                    this(cache, name, DEFAULT_REFRESH_PERIOD);
030            }
031    
032            /**
033             * Creates new instance of cache implementation for OSCache cache API.
034             *
035             * @param cache          OS cache instance
036             * @param name            cache name
037             * @param refreshPeriod How long before the object needs refresh. To allow the object to stay in the cache
038             *                      indefinitely, supply a value of CacheEntry.INDEFINITE_EXPIRY
039             */
040            public OSCache(final com.opensymphony.oscache.base.Cache cache, final String name, final int refreshPeriod) {
041                    this.cache = cache;
042                    this.name = name;
043                    this.refreshPeriod = refreshPeriod;
044    
045                    group = new String[]{name};
046            }
047    
048            /**
049             * {@inheritDoc}
050             */
051            public String getName() {
052                    return name;
053            }
054    
055            /**
056             * {@inheritDoc}
057             */
058            public boolean contains(final K key) {
059                    return get(key) != null;
060            }
061    
062            /**
063             * {@inheritDoc}
064             */
065            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
066            public V get(final K key) {
067                    try {
068                            return (V) cache.getFromCache(toString(key), refreshPeriod);
069                    } catch (NeedsRefreshException e) {
070                            cache.cancelUpdate(toString(key));
071                            return null;
072                    }
073            }
074    
075            /**
076             * {@inheritDoc}
077             */
078            public void put(final K key, final V value) {
079                    cache.putInCache(toString(key), value, group);
080            }
081    
082            /**
083             * {@inheritDoc}
084             */
085            public V remove(final K key) {
086                    final V result = get(key);
087                    cache.flushEntry(toString(key));
088                    return result;
089            }
090    
091            /**
092             * {@inheritDoc}
093             */
094            public void clear() {
095                    cache.flushGroup(name);
096            }
097    
098            /**
099             * Gets unique string representation of cache key. It adds cache name to make resulting key more unique.
100             *
101             * @param key cache key
102             * @return unique value of cache key that can be used as global cache key
103             */
104            private String toString(final K key) {
105                    return String.valueOf(key) + "." + name;
106            }
107    
108            /**
109             * {@inheritDoc}
110             */
111            @Override
112            public String toString() {
113                    final DescriptionBuilder builder = new DescriptionBuilder(getClass());
114                    builder.append("name", name);
115                    builder.append("cache", cache);
116                    return builder.toString();
117            }
118    }
